resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157839</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157839</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2332</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Repository of images on the History of Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Behälter von Bildern auf der Geschichte der 
Wissenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dépôt des images sur l'histoire de la Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Repositório das imagens no history da ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deposito delle immagini sulla storia di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποθήκη των εικόνων στην ιστορία της επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Depósito de imágenes en la historia de la 
ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a repository of pictures whcih represent twentieth-century scientific research</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">American History</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Behälter der Abbildungen, die 
whcih Zwanzigstjahrhundert wissenschaftliche Forschung darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un dépôt des images que le whcih 
représente la recherche scientifique de vingtième-siècle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um repositório dos retratos que o whcih 
representa uma pesquisa científica de vigésimo-século</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un deposito delle immagini che il whcih 
rappresenta la ricerca scientifica di ventesimo-secolo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια αποθήκη των εικόνων whcih 
αντιπροσωπεύει την επιστημονική έρευνα εικοστός-αιώνα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un depósito de cuadros que el whcih 
representa la investigación científica del vige'simo-siglo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire Américaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History Americano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia Americana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανική ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia Americana</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE2332</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Smithsonian National museum of American history for conditions of use see link http://www.si.edu/copyright/</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
              <entry>

              </entry>

    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

    <name>

    <item>
